title: 192: Listening with Curiosity with Larry King
description:
How do you become an incredible listener? 

Today I’m excited to welcome an extremely special guest, one of my mentors, and legend, Larry King. 

Larry is recognized worldwide as one of the best media personalities of our time. He’s widely known for his TV interview and phone-in talk show, “Larry King Live” on CNN.

In this episode, Larry shares the broadcasting secret that afforded him immense success during his 63 years in the industry. Considering his remarkable career and legacy, you’d be surprised to know that his journey started from these three things: Curiosity, true empathy, and lifelong passion. 

If you ever find yourself wanting to know and understand the people and events around you, I can assure you, all you need to do is listen. 

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
